channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Martin Fishback
channel.desc: Following tactless middle-class dad Martin Fishback as he decides to become a successful novelist, having being made redundant after 25 years in the toothpaste industry. Put on the spot by an incompetent police officer, Martin settles on writing a detective crime thriller and heads into his home town of Exeter, aka the crime capital of east Devon, for inspiration.
